sect2.title: Updating the date
sect2.para: The following elements should be updated whenever any change (including small typo fixes) is made: <!ENTITY version "20020429"> <!ENTITY releasedate "April 29th, 2002"> The two dates must correspond and the first is in the format YYYYMMDD.

sect2.title: Adding / updating entities
sect2.para: Package entities are now stored in individual .ent files throughout the BLFS CVS tree. You need to find the relevant ones and update them. Entities should be on one line (even if this requires wrapping because of the length).
